      • playFile

        private void playFile​(java.lang.String name)
        Plays the sound. If disabled, simply return.

        Hint: MediaPlayer.play() and MediaPlayer.dispose() are used. When creating a new MediaPlayer object, add it into the soundpool before playing it. Also set a callback for when the sound has completed: remove it from the soundpool, and dispose of the sound in a newly created thread using the dispose method.

        Make sure to set any threads you create as daemon threads so that the application will exit cleanly.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the sound file to be played, excluding .mp3
